item.title: Report E-2024050350
item.description:
Report E-2024050350

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-21T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-08
  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ESTES EXPRESS LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Clean Harbors was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted a 6ft-by-6ft area of the trailer floor and estimated that one (1) gallon of material was released due to crushed freight damaging one (1) 1-gallon plastic jug. Clean Harbors personnel used a neutralizer and absorbent to collect the released material. The recovered material was containerized into one (1) 55-gallon and one (1) 30- gallon poly drums. An impacted pallet was broken down and placed into one (1) 85-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location prior to the contractor demobilization. The generated waste will remain onsite for the ESTES DGRM team to coordinate disposal.
